Oct. 13, 2018 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section)

Prendergast Campus, Haverfordwest V.C. High School, Haverfordwest, Pembrokeshire Best instrumentalist: Hollie Horsell, cornet, Mid Rhondda Band Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 5 bands competed.
